full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/24/2023 2R$ SINDIAN EIT CT TOUR TOUR RRLE and TWOMRUPEES RUPEES D's. AFFIDAVIT I, Balwant Kaur, age 90 yrs. w/o Sh. Anup Singh r/0 H.No. WZ-41/1, Krishna Park, Tilak Nagar, New Delhi, do hereby solemnly affirm and declare as under:- 1. That I am resident of Delhi/India since 1947. 2. That Smt. Mohinder kaur w/o Late Sh. Gurdit Singh r/o 325/16, civil lines, Gurgoan/ Haryana is well known to me. She is my Cousin and widow of sh. Gurdit Singh. 3. That from my personal knowledge, T know that She was born on 1907 at Mitha Tiwana/ Pakistan. FOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b)(6) 4. That on enquiry, I came to know that the birth entry pertaining to the said smt. Mohinder kaur does not exist in the records of the municipality. 5. That the said smt. Mohinder kaur'sFOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b)(6) GEE3 So DATE: 28 MAR 1989 DEPONENT (BALWANT KAUR) VERIFICATION Verified that the contents of the above affidavit are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and nothing has been concealed therein. 2003 20 28 MAR 1989 DATE: DEPONENT VALID OUTSIDE INDIA (BALWANT KAUR) ATTESTED LA Seal App:Under of Notary Robert NOTARY PUBLIC Notesion Act. 1956 DELHI Delhi (India) 28 MAR 1989 DIE Annual Singh
